titleStmt.title: The lavvyers philosophy: or, Lavv brought to light Poetized in a diuine rhapsodie or contemplatiue poem. By Roger Tisdale, gent.
Lawyers philosophy.
titleStmt.author: Tisdale, Roger.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by G. Purslowe] for I. T[rundle] and H. G[osson] and sold at the widdow [A.] Gossons,

notesStmt.note: Signatures: A-C D⁴ (-A1, D4, probably blank).
Imperfect; trimmed at foot, affecting imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
